test_cases.title: Valid Login with New Password
test_cases.description: Verify successful login with a new password that meets the password requirements.
preconditions: User is on the login screen
New password meets the password requirements

test_steps.action: Enter a valid username and new password in the input fields
test_steps.expected_result: The password strength indicator shows a green checkmark
The user is redirected to the dashboard

expected_results: The user is successfully logged in
The password strength indicator shows a green checkmark

test_cases.title: Invalid Login with Weak Password
test_cases.description: Verify that an invalid login attempt with a weak password fails and displays an error message.
preconditions: User is on the login screen
New password does not meet the password requirements

test_steps.action: Enter an invalid username and a weak password in the input fields
test_steps.expected_result: The password strength indicator shows a red cross
An error message is displayed indicating that the password is weak

expected_results: An error message is displayed indicating that the password is weak
